notification.challengeResult.title: Challenge Result: Completed
notification.challengeResult.content: You have successfully completed the challenge '{{challengeName}}'! Check out your achievement now!
notification.groupChallengeResult.title: Group Challenge Result: Completed
notification.groupChallengeResult.content: Your group '{{groupName}}' has completed the challenge '{{challengeName}}'! View your group achievement now!
notification.challengeRoleUpdated.title: Challenge Role Updated
notification.challengeRoleUpdated.content: Your role in the challenge '{{challengeName}}' has been updated to: {{role}}
notification.challengeStarted.title: The challenge '{{challengeName}}' has started!
notification.challengeStarted.content: Get ready to conquer the challenge '{{challengeName}}' with GoBeyond!
notification.evidence.approved.title: Proof on {{day}} approved
notification.evidence.approved.content: Your proof submitted on {{day}} in the challenge '{{challengeName}}' has been approved. Keep it up!
notification.evidence.rejected.title: Proof on {{day}} rejected
notification.evidence.rejected.content: Your proof submitted on {{day}} in the challenge '{{challengeName}}' was rejected. Please check feedback and resubmit if needed.
notification.invite.challenge.title: Challenge Invitation
notification.invite.challenge.content: {{inviterName}} has invited you to join the challenge '{{challengeName}}'.
notification.invite.group.title: Group Invitation
notification.invite.group.content: {{inviterName}} has invited you to join the group '{{groupName}}'.
notification.invite.kickGroup.title: You were removed from the group
notification.invite.kickGroup.content: You were removed from the group '{{groupName}}' by the admin.
notification.invite.groupInvitation.title: Group Invitation
notification.invite.groupInvitation.content: You have been invited to join the group '{{groupName}}'.
notification.groupDisbanded.title: Group Disbanded
notification.challengeInvitation.title: You have a new invitation
notification.challengeInvitation.content: You have been invited to join the challenge '{{challengeName}}'.
notification.leaderChallengeInvitation.title: You have a new invitation
notification.leaderChallengeInvitation.content: You have been invited to lead a group in the challenge '{{challengeName}}'.
notification.groupJoinChallenge.title: Your group has joined a challenge!
notification.groupJoinChallenge.content: The group '{{groupName}}' has joined the challenge '{{challengeName}}'.
notification.challengeCancelled.title: Challenge Cancelled
notification.challengeCancelled.content: The challenge '{{challengeName}}' was cancelled by the admin or host.
notification.kickedFromChallenge.title: You were removed from the challenge
notification.kickedFromChallenge.content: You were removed from the challenge '{{challengeName}}' by the admin.
